channel.title: How do I add another Rights group?
channel.description: [size=10pt][b]How do I add another Rights group? For example 1 = Game Mod, 2 = Game Admin, 3 = Owner, and the new one I am planning to make 4 = Coder. I have the new crown PNG for the coder I just need to know where to put it in the client. Also I want the Coder to have the same rights as a Game Admin. BTW this is a 317 Delta source. Thanks. -Jim[/b][/size]

item.title: How do I add another Rights group?
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

Actualy 4 is invisible game owner.

Change that to your “Coder”.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add another Rights group?

item.title: How do I add another Rights group?
item.dc:creator: @agfy25 agfy25
item.description:
@agfy25 wrote:

[size=10pt]How do I add another Rights group? For example 1 = Game Mod, 2 = Game Admin, 3 = Owner, and the new one I am planning to make 4 = Coder. I have the new crown PNG for the coder I just need to know where to put it in the client. Also I want the Coder to have the same rights as a Game Admin. BTW this is a 317 Delta source.
Thanks.
-Jim[/size]
